Title da collection view where are shown the saved words in 'saved games' view
No button on alert popup that cancel the saving process.
Yes button on alert popup that save the game and overwrite the other with the same name.

trans-unit.source: Já existe um jogo salvo com o nome (aGame.name). Deseja sobreescrevê-lo?
trans-unit.target: You already have a game with this name. Do you want to overwrite it?
trans-unit.note: Alert message saying that there is game with the same name and asking if the user wants to overwrite it.
Alert title asking if the user wants to overwrite the game with the same name.
Cancel action button on alert popup that asks if the user wants to save a new game.
Save button on alert popup that asks if the user wants to save a new game.

trans-unit.source: Dê um nome ao jogo para que possa ser salvo
trans-unit.target: Give a name for this game
trans-unit.note: Alert message when is saving a new game saying the user to give a name to this game
TextField placeholder to the game name
Alert title asking if the user wants to save the new game
Collection view title to saved words
No button on alert popup that cancel the saving process.
Yes button on alert popup that save the game and overwrite the other with the same name.

trans-unit.source: Já existe um jogo salvo com o nome (aGame.name). Deseja sobreescrevê-lo?
trans-unit.target: You already have a game with this name. Do you want to overwrite it?
trans-unit.note: Alert message saying that there is game with the same name and asking if the user wants to overwrite it.
Alert title asking if the user wants to overwrite the game with the same name.
Cancel action button on alert popup that asks if the user wants to save a new game.
Save button on alert popup that asks if the user wants to save a new game.

trans-unit.source: Dê um nome ao jogo para que possa ser salvo.
trans-unit.target: Give a name for this new game
trans-unit.note: Alert message when is saving a new game saying the user to give a name to this game
TextField placeholder to the game name
Alert title asking if the user wants to save the new game
Message informing the user that if he returns, he will stop and cancel the game.

trans-unit.target: Do you really want to exit?
trans-unit.note: Ask the user if he wants to go back and cancel the game.
Button to cancel the action of returning.
Button to continue the action of returning to home screen and cancel the game.
Alert message informing the user to create new game before play.

trans-unit.target: You don't have any saved words yet
trans-unit.note: Alert title informing the user that he cant click on play game button because there isnt any saved word yet.

trans-unit.source: Todo conteúdo criado dentro da aplicação é de total responsabilidade de seus usuários.
trans-unit.target: All content created within this application is the entire responsibility of its users.
trans-unit.note: Message informing that the content of the application is the responsibility of the user
Ok button that close the alert
Title of an alert popup that appears when the user first use the app

trans-unit.target: The new words will be lost.
trans-unit.note: Message informing the user that if he returns, he will lose the words added to this new game.

trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to go back?
trans-unit.note: Ask the user if he wants to go back and cancel the creation of a new game.
Asks if the user wants to delete new clue when he is creating a new game.
Respond negatively if the user wants to delete new clue.
Respond positively if the user wants to delete new clue.
Button to close error message popup

trans-unit.source: Ops.. Houve um erro. Entre em contato conosco.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, there as an error. Please, contact us.
trans-unit.note: Messagem informing that there was a problem and saing the user to contact us
Short messagem informing that there was a problem and the game was not saved
Ok and close popup.
Short message informing that the game was saved successfully.

trans-unit.source: Já existe um jogo com o nome (aGame.name). Deseja sobreescrevê-lo?
trans-unit.target: You already have a game with this name. Do you want to overwrite it?
trans-unit.note: Message informing the user that there is a game saved with the same name and asking if he whants to save the game anyway and overwrite the other game.
Responds negatively to the question whether the user wants to overwrite the game and cancel the action of saving the new game.
Short message asking the user if he wants to overwrite a game.
Responds positively to the question whether the user wants to overwrite the game that has the same name and continue the action of saving the new game.
Cancel action
Continue action and delete the clue from the new game

trans-unit.target: Do you want to dele this word?
trans-unit.note: Asks the user if he wants to delete a clue from the new game.
Continue the insertion of the new clue.
Alert answer to go to game even if it will cancel the insertion of a new clue to the new game.

trans-unit.source: Ela não será incluída no jogo.
trans-unit.target: The new clue will not be added in the game.
trans-unit.note: This is the alert message when the user is craeting a new game, click on Play button and there is a new clue to be added in the game.

trans-unit.source: Você não terminou de adicionar a dica
trans-unit.target: You didn't finish adding the clue
trans-unit.note: This is the alert title when the user is craeting a new game, click on Play button and there is a new clue to be added in the game.
Cancel the action of saving the new game
Go to action and save the new game
Default text that will appear on the game name text field during alert popup when the user is saving a new game

trans-unit.target: Give a name for this game:
trans-unit.note: Alert that appears when the user wants to save a new game and asks the user to give a name for this game.
Button to cancel the action of returning.
Button to continue the action of returning to home screen and cancel the creation of a new game.
